groups.label: ErrorApplet_Sound_ImportError
groups.text:
Failed to load data for
Nintendo 3DS Sound.

groups.label: ErrorApplet_CreateSystemFolder_ErrorFailure
groups.text:
Could not create folder because the
SD Card could not be accessed.

Press  to return to the HOME Menu.

groups.label: ErrorApplet_Ecdk_IndicatesServiceNotAvailable
groups.text:
Cannot access Nintendo eShop.
Please wait for a while and try again.

groups.label: ErrorApplet_Ecdk_SessionInvalid
groups.text:
Unable to connect.

Please wait awhile and try again.

groups.label: ErrorApplet_Theater_NetworkError
groups.text: Failed to connect to the server.

groups.label: ErrorApplet_AccessSdCard_ErrorFailure
groups.text:
Could not access the SD Card.

Press  to return to the HOME Menu.

groups.label: ErrorApplet_CreateSystemFolder_ErrorNothingFreeSpace
groups.text:
Could not create folder because
there is not enough free space 
on the SD Card.

Press  to return to the HOME Menu.
